title: White House backtracks after Biden appears to say US would defend Taiwan against China
content:
1. White House backtracks after Biden appears to say US would defend Taiwan against China  The Guardian
  2. Biden says U.S. allies like S. Korea are fundamentally different from Afghanistan  Arirang News
  3. Biden vowed US would ‘respond’ to Chinese invasion of Taiwan after Afghanistan debacle  Yahoo News
  4. U.S. position on Taiwan unchanged despite Biden comment - official  Reuters
  5. Biden spits empty, reckless words on Taiwan question amid Afghanistan embarrassment: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
